data.lyric:
[ti:Letter To Nipsey(feat. Roddy Ricch) (Explicit)]
[ar:Meek Mill/Roddy Ricch]
[al:Letter To Nipsey (feat. Roddy Ricch)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Letter To Nipsey(feat. Roddy Ricch) (Explicit) - Meek Mill/Roddy Ricch
[00:09.86]Yeah
[00:10.79]I just left your viewing at the Staples Center I did
[00:13.06]Obama wrote you a letter yeah you made it n***a you made it
[00:15.55]I even heard you had some plans to come to Vegas with us
[00:18.12]And them s**kers could never kill you it only made you bigger yeah
[00:20.74]And every time I see some fire I see blue
[00:23.06]And every time I close my eyes see Snupe and I see you
[00:25.65]When I be on the Westside Westside you know how we do how we do
[00:28.27]Hustle and motivate turning one into a two two
[00:30.73]Two into four hurt my heart I seen you on the floor
[00:33.86]Do it for the hood man I don't even wanna do it no more
[00:36.41]When these n***as you do it for they'll shoot you and all
[00:39.00]Only thing I can say is you with Allah blessings blessings
[00:41.83]And I ain't finna sit here act like I'm your main homie I won't
[00:44.23]But when we lost you it really put some pain on me it did
[00:46.96]Got me scared to go outside without that flame on me brrt
[00:49.35]And when them n***as went against me you ain't change on me
[00:51.79]You ain't change on me
[00:52.21]Told me it was wrong or right some of my longest nights
[00:54.17]What you do
[00:54.70]You made me cry n***a cry n***a
[00:56.17]And I don't cry n***a I don't cry n***a
[00:57.77]You the first one made me feel like I could die n***a
[00:59.75]Like I could die
[01:00.05]'Cause real n***s never die you know the vibes n***a
[01:01.98]You know the vibes n***a yeah
[01:03.44]Couple days ago was chilling with my youngins
[01:05.05]Seen your kids on the 'Gram it made me sicker to my stomach
[01:08.00]Made me sick
[01:08.57]And as the marathon continue we keep running
[01:10.40]We won't stop
[01:11.00]But I'm like d**n I wish you seen that pussy coming for real
[01:13.25]I wish I knew when the storm came storm came
[01:15.36]How many tears did you cry when you lost someone
[01:17.97]We did this s**t all for the gutter woah w-woah woah
[01:20.80]Did this s**t for my lil' brother woah w-woah woah brother
[01:23.20]Had to stare through these tears
[01:24.57]'Cause I see you every time my eyes close every time my eyes
[01:28.09]Asking myself why you had to go but only God knows only God knows
[01:34.00]I was in Miami when I lost you I ain't talk about it yeah
[01:36.82]I remember I bawled out in tears when I saw your body mmh
[01:39.27]And the flight back home had cold days in LA hmm
[01:41.75]Had to turn off my phone throw on the shades and meditate
[01:43.85]What you know 'bout wishing goin' blind to hide your tears
[01:46.31]Had a lot of murder on my mind but in God I fear
[01:48.67]Took Yompton and Crenshaw around the globe in a year woah
[01:51.90]'Member ridin' solo now it's Escalades in my rear woah
[01:54.23]I just hustle motivate be prolific hold down the state
[01:56.67]My big brother Hussle the great I know Cobby Supreme relate
[01:59.07]I know Jay Rock Hoggy relate
[02:00.17]Blacc Sam Adam relate Key to J Stone relate
[02:02.93]Lauren Pacman it's love I wanna see you do great
[02:05.49]I wish I knew when the storm came storm came
[02:07.64]How many tears did you cry when you lost someone
[02:10.12]We did this s**t all for the gutter woah w-woah woah
[02:12.77]Did this s**t for my lil' brother woah w-woah woah brother
[02:15.35]Had to stare through these tears
[02:16.73]'Cause I see you every time my eyes close every time my eyes
[02:20.41]Asking myself why you had to go but only God knows only God knows
data.trans:
[ti:Letter To Nipsey(feat. Roddy Ricch) (Explicit)]
[ar:Meek Mill/Roddy Ricch]
[al:Letter To Nipsey (feat. Roddy Ricch)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:09.86]//
[00:10.79]我刚在Staples Center观看了你的表演
[00:13.06]奥巴马给你写了一封信 你做到了 兄弟 你成功了
[00:15.55]我甚至听说你打算到维加斯来和我们见见面
[00:18.12]那些混蛋永远不能消灭你 只会让你更强大
[00:20.74]每当我看到火热的场面 都少不了你的身影
[00:23.06]每当我闭上双眼 我就会看见Lil Snupe 我就会看见你
[00:25.65]当我们在西海岸的时候 你知道我们会怎么做
[00:28.27]你努力拼搏 不曾松懈 不断成长
[00:30.73]后来大有成就 看到你倒地不起 我的心好痛
[00:33.86]都是为了朋友们 朋友 我都不想再这样做
[00:36.41]你一心一意为了他们 他们却对你扣动扳机
[00:39.00]我只能说 阿拉真主与你同在
[00:41.83]我不会装作我是你的好朋友 我不会
[00:44.23]但当我们失去你时 我真的有点难受
[00:46.96]搞得我都不敢不带武器出门去
[00:49.35]当那些家伙对我反目成仇 你对我从来没变过
[00:51.79]你对我从来没变过
[00:52.21]给我讲是非对错 那些夜晚无比漫长
[00:54.17]你做了什么
[00:54.70]你让我忍不住哭泣
[00:56.17]我可是从不流泪的人啊
[00:57.77]你是第一个让我觉得生不如死的人
[00:59.75]生不如死
[01:00.05]因为真正的大佬永垂不朽 你都懂的
[01:01.98]你都懂的 兄弟
[01:03.44]几天前 我和兄弟们在一起
[01:05.05]在网上看到了你的孩子 我顿时觉得更加难受
[01:08.00]我很难受
[01:08.57]人生的马拉松依然在继续 我们不停向前跑
[01:10.40]我们不会止步
[01:11.00]但我多希望你能见到我眼前的场景
[01:13.25]我多希望能在风暴来临前知晓一切
[01:15.36]当你失去一个人时 流了多少眼泪
[01:17.97]我们做这一切都是为了朋友们
[01:20.80]都是为了我的小弟
[01:23.20]眼含泪水凝望着远方
[01:24.57]每当我闭上双眼 都会看见你
[01:28.09]我问自己 为何你要离去 但只有上帝知道答案
[01:34.00]失去你时 我还在迈阿密 我不想多聊这件事
[01:36.82]我记得看到你的遗体时 眼泪夺眶而出
[01:39.27]乘飞机回到家 在洛杉矶度过了寒冷的日子
[01:41.75]关掉手机 戴上墨镜 独自沉思
[01:43.85]你知道吗 我希望自己是个瞎子 把眼泪都藏在墨镜后
[01:46.31]我脑子里萌生出谋杀的念头 但是我真的很恐惧
[01:48.67]仅用一年时间就让Youngstown和Crenshaw闻名于世
[01:51.90]记得曾经是独来独往 如今我的身后跟着一支车队
[01:54.23]我努力奋斗 不停创作 影响一方民众
[01:56.67]我的兄弟Nipsey Hussle是伟人 我知道Cobby Supreme也这样认为
[01:59.07]我知道Jay Rock和Hoggy也这样认为
[02:00.17]Blacc Sam和Adam这样认为 Key和J Stone这样认为
[02:02.93]Lauren和Pacman也不例外 这就是爱 我希望你们都好好的
[02:05.49]我多希望能在风暴来临前知晓一切
[02:07.64]当你失去一个人时 流了多少眼泪
[02:10.12]我们做这一切都是为了朋友们
[02:12.77]都是为了我的小弟
[02:15.35]眼含泪水凝望着远方
[02:16.73]每当我闭上双眼 都会看见你
[02:20.41]我问自己 为何你要离去 但只有上帝知道答案
